Title: Silverlight DiscussionBoard for SharePoint
Description: SLDB is a Silverlight webpart that displaysys displas Sharepoinnd Discussions Boards in a Silverlight Treeview Control(Discussions the way they were meant to be!).
HomeWiki: This is a SharePoint 3.0 webpart that uses a Silverlight treeview to display metadata about Sharepoint discussions and uses the htmlbridge to show the content of the discussion in a <div>on a sharepoint webpart page.
